title.rendered: Thunder Bay International Airport in Ontario, Thunder Bay, Canada

content.rendered:
Verified & Updated on: 11/02/21

Thunder Bay International Airport in Ontario, Thunder Bay, Canada Address, Phone number, Lost and Found contact

Thunder Bay International Airport Ontario, Thunder Bay Address: 340-100 Princess Street
Thunder Bay, ON P7E 6S2

Phone number: 1 (807) 473-2600

Fax: 1 (807) 475-9627

Email: info@tbairport.on.ca

Thunder Bay International Airport Official website: http://www.tbairport.on.ca/

Thunder Bay International Airport Facebook :https://www.facebook.com/tbayairport/

IATA code: YQT

ICAO code: CYQT

WMO: 71749

Facilities and Services at Thunder Bay International Airport

  • Restaurant
  • Gift Shop
  • Car Rentals
  • Parking

Lost and Found – Thunder Bay International Airport

If you lost or received items at Airport Terminal, Please contact
Thunder Bay International Airport

Phone: 1 (807) 473-2612

Car Rental Services at Thunder Bay International Airport

AvisBudgetNationalDriving ForceEnterprise
Avis Website
Budget Website
National Website
Driving Force Website
Enterprise Website

Taxi Services at Thunder Bay International Airport

Roach’s Yellow Taxi: 216 Camelot Street
Thunder Bay, ON P7A 4B1

Phone: 1 (807) 344-8481

Diamond Lacey’s Taxi: 113 Leith Street
Thunder Bay, ON P7C 1M7

Phone: 1 (807) 622-6001

Hotel Shuttles at Thunder Bay International Airport

  • Valhalla Inn
  • Landmark Inn
  • Airlane Travelodge Hotel
